main event: A bright, cigar-shaped object was observed hovering over New York City for several minutes before accelerating and disappearing rapidly.
interesting points: The object was described as metallic in appearance, approximately 30-40 feet in length, and emitting a bright white glow.
Several other witnesses in the vicinity corroborated the sighting.
No sound was reported from the object.
No other physical evidence or photographs were obtained.
The case was investigated by Project Blue Book and classified as 'unidentified' due to the lack of conclusive information about the nature and origin of the object.
witnesses: a New York City resident and several others in the vicinity
photographs: no, the report does not include any photographs
